articles.author: Louis Jacobson
articles.title: Fact-checking Donald Trump’s claims about the 2020 election during Joe Rogan interview - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: The conversation came less than two weeks before Election Day and ranged from claims about life on Mars to illegal immigration to his tariffs plan.
articles.content: In a three-hour interview with podcaster Joe Rogan a conversation that lasted even longer than one of Donald Trumps rally speeches the former president repeated falsehoods about the outcome of the 20… [+5221 chars]
